#基础绘图
set.seed(123)
x <- 1:10
y <- x^2 + rnorm(10, 0, 5)
#创建一个分组变量grp，前5个是组A，后5个是组B
grp <- factor(rep(c("A","B"), each = 5))
vals <- c(18, 12, 10, 8)               
names(vals) <- c("Q1","Q2","Q3","Q4")
#一、plot函数
#plot()函数,pch代表点的形状(19为实心圆),cex代表点的尺寸,col代表点/线的颜色,lty代表线形(2为虚线),lwd代表线宽,xlim/ylim规定x/y轴的范围,main="标题",sub="副标题",xlab/ylab代表x/y轴标签,axes表示是否绘制坐标轴,frame.plot代表是否绘制外边框)
plot(x,y,type="b",pch=19,cex=1.2,col="darkblue",lty=2,lwd=2,xlim=c(0,12),main="图形标题",sub="副标题",xlab="x轴标签",ylab="y轴标签",axes=TRUE,frame.plot=TRUE)
#lines()函数代表在现有图形上加“线”，lowess(x,y)代表拟合出一条平滑曲线,还可以换成其他直线，例如回归线等。
lines(lowess(x, y), col="tomato", lwd=2, lty=1,type="s")  
#points()函数代表在现有图上加“点”
points(x[grp=="A"], y[grp=="A"], pch=19, col="royalblue", cex=0.5)
points(x[grp=="B"], y[grp=="B"], pch=17, col="orange",    cex=0.5)
#text()函数代表文本标注text(x坐标, y坐标, labels="文字", pos=位置, col=颜色)
text(5, 50, "这是标注", pos=3, col="red")
#abline()函数用于绘制参照线
#水平线
abline(h=mean(y),col="red",lty=2,lwd=2)
#垂直线
abline(v=5,col="grey",lty=3,lwd=12)
#回归线
fit<-lm(y~x)
abline(fit,col="darkgreen",lwd=2) 
#legend()函数用于标记图例,参数"topleft""topright""bottom"代表图例的位置，legend代表图例内容，cex/pt.cex代表文字/点的大小,ncol代表图例的列数，inset代表图例与图案边缘内缩的距离。
legend("topleft",legend = c("组A","组B"),pch= c(19, 17),col=c("royalblue","orange"),
pt.cex=0.9,bty="n",inset = 0.02,ncol=1, cex = 1.2)
#二、barplot()条形图,参数：border:NA代表无边界,las:刻度文字方向,0竖直,1水平
barplot(vals,beside = TRUE, col=c("#4C78A8","#F58518","#E45756","#72B7B2"),border = NA, ylim   = c(0, 20),main  ="barplot():季度销量",xlab= "季度", ylab = "数量",las=1)              
#三、hist()直方图
hist(y,
     breaks = "Sturges",        
     freq   = FALSE,            
     col    = "skyblue",
     border = "white",
     main   = "hist(): 直方图（密度）",
     xlab   = "Y",
     ylim   = c(0, 0.08),
     right  = TRUE)             
lines(density(y), lwd=2, col="tomato")   
#四、箱线图
boxplot(y ~ grp,
        col   = c("lightblue","moccasin"),
        notch = TRUE,           
        outline = TRUE,         
        names = c("A组","B组"),
        main  = "boxplot(): 分组箱线图",
        ylab  = "Y 值")
#五、饼图
pie(vals,
    labels = paste0(names(vals), " (", vals, ")"),
    col    = c("#4C78A8","#F58518","#E45756","#72B7B2"),
    radius = 1,                 
    clockwise = TRUE,           
    init.angle = 90,            
    main   = "pie(): 饼图示例")
